About Me

About Me & My Legal Journey

I’m Prabhat Kumar Singh, a graduate of the Faculty of Law, Delhi University. As a passionate and determined first-generation lawyer, I’ve worked under experienced litigators in Delhi, gaining hands-on exposure in civil, criminal, and cyber law. I am now focused on building my independent practice and assisting clients with reliable, ethical legal support.

  • ✔️ Experience in Delhi's District & High Courts
  • ✔️ Expert in drafting Plaint, Written Statements, Bail & SLPs
  • ✔️ Specialized in Cybercrime, IPR, MSME & Family Law matters
  • ✔️ Committed to client-focused legal solutions
